You opened your Tattletail before Christmas, and now he won't stay in his box. Can you keep him out of trouble until Christmas day? Or will Mama Tattletail find her baby and hunt you down first? I heard she was recalled after she ate a kid's eyes out. Just a rumor.

name: Dancing Hut
description:
Ridiculous and funny retro pixel styled pseudo-endless runner full of cute creatures and lots of pixel gore.
This is a quick and accessible game of skill,easy to approach but hard to master.

Tap to switch legs ,keep balance and try to walk as far as You can!

Features:
Retro 2D pixel graphics
Ragdoll physics
Easy one touch control- tap to switch legs,swipe up or down for quick restart
Power ups(Try on the new shoes together with GORE+ mode)
Pixel gore
Lots of gameplay tricks to find out

name: To the Capital
description: To The Capital is roguelike game with battles as in old jRPG in a medieval setting with pretty graphics.

name: Operation Hardcore
description: Operation Hardcore is an action-packed 2D side-scrolling shooter inspired by classic twitchy action games of yesteryear, but with modern touches and conveniences.

name: Yearly
description: There’s a difference between looking back and wanting to go back.

name: Automobilista: Formula Truck
description: Formula Truck for Automobilista brings the official simulation of the popular Brazilian Formula Truck series - the most competitive truck racing series in the world!

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Mustang
description: Mustang Premium 'Boss' (2014): celebrates 50 years of one of the most iconic muscle cars ever made, the Ford Mustang. Players are challenged to race a variety of Mustangs against an array of colorful characters in eight different racing scenarios including drag racing, drifting and road racing.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
description: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein (1995): is a deep and atmospheric table designed by John Borg. This Sega produced table, released in 1995, features interesting modal gameplay, spectacular music and a fully animated Frankenstein Monster that actually throws the balls across the playfield during multiball.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Ripley's Believe It or Not!
description: Ripley's Believe it or Not! (2004): This is possibly the most complex table to come from legendary pinball designer Pat Lawlor (who also created Funhouse and Addams Family). It allows players to travel with Robert Ripley across seven continents to discover the strange, the bizarre, and the unusual!

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: High Roller Casino
description: High Roller Casino (2001): puts players in the roll of a high stakes gambler with money to burn.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Star Trek
description: Star Trek Vengeance Premium (2013): is another outstanding game from designer, Steve Ritchie. Based on the new series of Star Trek films, players take on the role of Captain Kirk commanding the USS Enterprise in a fight to save the Federation.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Harley Davidson
description: Harley-Davidson / Third Edition (1999): Designed by industry veterans, Lonnie D. Ropp and John Borg, this table grabs your attention with its chrome trim, classic rock n’ roll soundtrack and loud shaker motor that simulates the roar of a real Harley motor.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: AC/DC
description: AC/DC Premium (2012): perfectly captures the head banging vibe of one of the most legendary rock bands in the world, AC/DC. Designed by Steve Ritchie, the gameplay centers around 12 unique song modes based on the band's biggest hits, including Back in Black, Thunderstruck and Highway to Hell.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Last Action Hero
description: Last Action Hero (1993): 'Did somebody say action?' This action-packed pinball powerhouse harbors the license for the summer blockbuster hit movie of the same name.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Phantom of the Opera
description: Phantom of the Opera (1990): is based on the classic novel from Gaston Leroux, published in 1910. Designed by Joe Kaminkow and Ed Cebula, this game makes excellent use of its license with outstanding audio effects and imagery that tells the story of the Phantom.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade: Starship Troopers
description: Starship Troopers (1997): features the license for the popular film of the same name released in 1997. Designed by Joe Balcer and Joe Kaminkow, this table conveys the style and feel of the movie with its vibrantly colored playfield, music from the movie and custom speech.

name: Lisa: The Pointless
description: LISA: The Pointless is in equal parts a story about a garbage man trying to run away from the world and the story of that very world he is trying to escape.

name: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai
description: Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai is a comprehensive rebalance of the popular fighter Koihime Enbu, featuring 14 playable characters, with “Chōryō” and "assist" character “Kaku” joining their rivals on the battlefield for the first time!

name: Snake Escape
description:
Guide a snake through increasingly difficult mazes in order to escape and reach the food... featuring:
Code and levels (converted and new) by myself
Awesome graphics by top artist BiNMaN
Awesome soundtrack by top composer MmcM
Original concept by Tommi Tuovinen

This game is based on a webgame called LIME RICK, although with a modified design. Many maze levels were "improved" from the original (hardest levels became even harder), and there are also 4 extra (extremely hard) new levels at the end. Can you solve them all???

Download it now from here and have fun!

NOTE: Play it on a ZX-Spectrum 128K model otherwise you will miss the AY music!

NOTE2: This game uses multicolor graphics powered by NIRVANA+ Engine, so it will work on all original ZX-Spectrum models without the need for additional hardware. It should also work on any accurate emulator, including the ZX Vega.

name: Orc Hunter VR
description:
In the roomscale VR wavegame Orc Hunter you have to defend yourself against endless hordes of orcs. Even though the game is still in the development phase, you can download the demo to find out what Orc Hunter is capable of, right now.

Currently the game can only be played using an HTC Vive.

name: Strike Squadron: Caracará
description:
Story-driven 2D Space sim inspired by 90's space sims.

You are not an ace pilot, nor is your squadron the best of the best. You just want to do your job, whatever the cost.

name: Polygon Attack
description: Break through unlimited waves of enemies and fight unpredictable bosses!

name: Clazer
description: Clazer is a simulation that allows you to experience the art of sport shooting from the comfort and convenience of virtual reality.

name: Fighters Unleashed
description:
Fighters Unleashed is an old school Beat'em up game with a modern look and feel, combos, ninjas, soldiers, zombies, and more.
Are you good enought to unleash your power ??

name: Christmas Massacre VR
description: Blast snowmen with lethal ornaments, candy canes, and snowballs in this festive virtual reality shooter! Take a gun in each hand and fight long and hard against the oncoming waves of evil snowmen! Rack up cash throughout the waves to unlock different weapons and try to survive as long as possible.

name: Alcatraz: VR Escape Room
description: "Alcatraz: VR Escape Room" is a story based puzzle game inspired by such classics as Crimson Room. You discover bits and pieces about your life from notes left behind from someone who is trying to help you escape.

name: Holiday Bonus Gold
description: What's in Santa's sack? It's a Holiday Bonus that the whole family will love. Chill out with this cool winter-themed puzzle game - it's slicker than Santa on an icy roof!

name: Nick
description: Nick is a free VR survival shooter defense game. Built in the Unreal engine, this first-person, room-scale VR experience lets users take control of a variety of weapons and tools to fight off endless waves of evil robotic elves. As Santa, users must move around the environment to set up defenses and dodge attacks to beat back the onslaught. 'Tis the season!

name: Pythagorea 60°
description: Pythagorea 60° is a collection of more than 270 geometric problems of different kind that can be solved without complex constructions or calculations. All objects are drawn on a grid whose cells are equilateral triangles. A lot of levels can be solved using just your geometric intuition or by finding natural laws, regularity, and symmetry.

name: Star Revenge 5: Neo Blue Realm
description:
This is the 5th of the "Star Revenge" Series of SM64 hacks. Not directly visable in the name but this is a remake of SR0.5 UL. The 7 main courses share the same theme with the old hack, but the models itself differ a lot.

For the most part you play as Mario and find yourself in front of a Castle after being send away by a trap in the past. There are 70 stars to find which are mostly easy but some hidden stuff here and there to explore with 3 different endings to this hack.

name: Ikemen Bakumatsu: Unmei no Koi Hana no Miyako to Koi no Ran
description: PS Vita and PS4 port of the original smartphone release.

name: Return to Ruins
description: Return to Ruins is a 3 maps episode for the DOS version of Powerslave / Exhumed.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Alpha Mission II
description: Alpha Mission II is a shooting game released by SNK in 1991. The game is a fan-favorite in the genre, and features unique gameplay allowing players to collect and upgrade armor power-ups and switch them out on the fly. This second entry in the series adds a wealth of new flashy armor power-ups, expanding on the tactical and exciting gameplay the series is known for.

name: Brain Booster
description:
Are you ready to pump up your brains? Then Brain Booster is for you! 
Unique intellectual tasks, several levels of difficulty will force your brains move. You will not just choose correct answers, you should create them by yourself!  
It seems challenging? Just try it!

name: Senses in Decay
description:
After the "resonance cascade", the H.E.C.U spread to almost all the sector of Black Mesa. The sector A was the most closest to the surface, that's why our protagonist manage to escape so easily.

John White escaped in a car, but he stopped in a storage facility of Black mesa. He destroy a vent to find supplies, but he find himself trapped in that supply room. The only way to escape is crossing all the F,G,H sectors of Black Mesa to the principal entrance.

name: Classic Offensive
description: Classic Offensive is an in development community made modification for Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. CO aims to bring Counter Strike back to its roots with completely remade classic maps, character models, and weapons that hearken back to their original versions while also keeping the improvements that CS:GO has made.

name: Kiniro Mosaic Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Theta Emerald EX
description: Pokémon Theta Emerald EX is a remake of the difficulty/enhancement rom hack Pokémon Theta Emerald.

name: Re;member
description: Re; member is an adventure, mystery, horror and puzzle game with a great focus on history and lasting two to three hours leading to three different endings. It was created by keespring in RPG Maker VX and translated from Japanese into Korean, Chinese, Spanish and English.

name: A Christmas Game
description: A cross-media game of three tragic stories told by three shepherds.

name: Red Spider Anecdote: Triangle
description: "Red Spider Anecdote: Triangle" is a Hong Kong Noir style Visual Novel.

name: Red
description: Story: Red receives the invitation card from her grandmother and decides to visit her, but there is all over the monsters on her way. Those monsters try to stop and take her away, so she needs to use her personality to get out of the danger. The story background is in the deep forest. Red has to pass challenges to arrive her grandma's house. However, she finds out her grandma's conspiracy and then fight with the monster which is turned from her grandmother to save the girls.

name: Gotham Gangsta
description: The job simulator of bank robbery! Play cops and robbers together. Player 1 robs banks in room scale VR - Player 2 hunts em' with keyboard/mouse FPS

name: 99Vidas
description:
"99Vidas" is a "beat 'em up" set in a contemporary world that pays tribute to both the new and the classic in gaming industry. Brought to you in all pixelated, 16 bit-esque glory, chockfull of references to not only gaming, but all 80's and 90's pop culture.

99Vidas is set in a fictional anachronic universe, inspired by video games and the pop culture of the 1980s and 1990s. The game begins when an artifact known as 99Vidas goes missing. This artifact is believed to hold such great power it could bring darkness and chaos to our very existence, should it ever fall into the hands of those with evil intents.

As the Guardians of the 99Vidas, granted the Power of the Elements, bound to live through the ages to protect the artifact, it is your responsibility to face the forces of evil, defeat the Evil Boss and his six henchmen, and retrieve the 99Vidas.

name: Angry Anna: Christmas Quest
description: You're Angry Anna, the most angriest girl of the world who's having now a very bad christmas and you decided to heist santa for get your real present.

name: Redacted Hired Gun
description: You are a lone mercenary on a mission and you'll be going all Schwarzenegger on folks!

name: Haunted Hotel: The Thirteenth
description: Search the mysterious hotel, uncover the secrets of the Bakers family, explore the rooms and save your son Matthew. Remember, that any hotel can keep more secrets, than you can imagine.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu
description: 100% Orange Juice - Nath & Tomato+Mimyuu Character Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Nath who powers up with battle cards to devastating effect, and the prankster duo, Tomato&Mimyuu with their unique tag team play. The characters come fully voiced!

name: Dead.Air
description: dead.air is a single-level PK3 for Doom II that requires GZDoom source port to play. It was designed by Xaser Acheron. It was released in December 2016 and is the spiritual sequel to his map dead.wire. It received one of the 2017 Cacowards and reached second place in the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.

name: A Ghost Story for Christmas
description: A text-based game made by Charlie Dart. It is a game about ghosts, yes, but it's also about getting to know a character for whom things are not going to end well.

name: HoD: On open seas
description: A short pirate story with multiple characters in an unknown world.

name: Flock VR
description: Flock is an interactive music video with a score composed by Tim Fain and Julien Mier. Players swing Golden Orbs around on strings. The Orbs attract birds which eat the bugs that the surround you. As bugs are eaten the music and imagery transitions through a psychedelic rainbow of light and color.

name: ACA Neo Geo: Metal Slug
description: Metal Slug is the original entry in one of the most famous action game series ever released. It was originally released by SNK in 1996. Players control Marco and Tarma who belong to the Special Forces team known as the 'Peregrine Falcon Squad'. They fight to defeat General Donald Morden, in an effort to take back their stolen weapon known as the 'Metal Slug'. Players can utilize various weapons and vehicles such as the Metal Slug to sway the fight in their favor.

name: TBmsTF
description: TBmsTF, which stands for The Button Machine Sees The Future, similar to TGsEE and TBmHC, is a teaser game for Five Nights at Treasure Island Remastered 4.0

name: Genius Quiz HP
description: Genius Quiz HP is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Harry Potter universe.

name: The Bounce
description: The Bounce is a bouncy ball physics platformer game. Simple to understand yet incredibly hard to master, what seems easy at first glance is actually pretty rage inducing when you get to the later levels. The game has a focus on simple design, which allows for easily customisable levels and awesome gameplay.

name: Hero Wars
description:
Fight for the Ultimate power in a Major War. Tame the chaos, clear the attacked by the Evil lands of Dominion. Set your rules. – It’s your world from now on! Dominate it.

Gain the collection of the mightiest Heroes, unlock all their skills and abilities. Power them up to a level beyond attainment, experience them in PvP Arena battles, Guild wars and RPG battle campaigns – make your army invincible and win a Major War. Establish your own everlasting RPG legacy.
Dominion is waiting for its Hero!

name: Rance 5D: The Lonely Girl + Rance VI: Collapse of Zeth
description: Rance 5D: The Lonely Girl + Rance VI: Collapse of Zeth is a bundle that exclusively includes both games for English audiences.

name: Craftmas
description: Create colorful 3D ornaments and decorate your own winter wonderland in this shareable VR experience.

name: 4x4 Dirt Track Forest Driving
description: Get ready to go off the beaten path and explore the unknown of the best Off Road Driving Tracks! Choose from a variety of Epic 4x4 Trucks, Buggies, SUVs & Pickups and put them through their paces!

name: Driving Academy 2018 Simulator
description: Road signs and driving made simpler – just for you! Enroll in this virtual school of driving called the Driving Academy 2018 Simulator, and master your driving and parking skills.

name: Wind Runner Adventure
description: Follow the treasure map you get form the Crow and enjoy the fun filled adventure!

name: Eye of the Owl
description: Go back in time over 500 years to Hieronymus Bosch's studio and explore his masterpiece - The Garden of Earthly Delights

name: SoulHunt
description: SoulHunt is a ‘Hide ‘n Seek’ multiplayer game.

name: Pinball Parlor
description:
A concept anyone can instantly understand.
The joy of experiencing a novelty not found in any other game.
A game you will want to play again and again after only a short period of time.

name: Super Ninja Hero VR
description: "super ninja hero vr"is a VR-FPS game(first-person shooting game) that developed by Wuhan Firegame Co.,Ltd..Variety of scenes with cool fighting, strong cunning enemies and smart BOSS.Taking up your arms to begin a legend.

name: Wild Game Hunter VR
description: Grab your rifle, get outdoors, and bag some wild game! In this immersive virtual reality hunting experience, you'll get only a few chances for the perfect shot. Dropped into a 360 degree woodland, you're surrounded by critters & nature while you play through multiple levels hunting for *wild game*!

name: Kyoto Tanoji Quest
description:
"Kyoto Tanoji Quest" is a role-playing game set in the "Tanoji area" in Kyoto city.
Your goal is to enjoy the trip at 12 shopping streets!
The player himself becomes the main character of this game, aiming at a high score while enjoying conversation with people and overcoming the fight with myself.

name: Starship Survivor
description: Starship Survivor is a VR game built from the ground up to deliver free-moving, exciting action combat gameplay with elements of strategy and tower defense. Set in an alien-type thriller environment with dark rooms, your mission is to restore power to the very ship that turned against you.

name: Masha Rescues Grandma
description: Masha rescues GrandMa is an adventure game along with mini-games intended for all, young and seniors.

name: DinoFense
description: Defend your Dino Village and Dinozens from being attacked by the uncivilized world! Play rescue missions on the Beach, in the Jungle, or near a Volcano by fighting off the angry cavemen and animals who imprisoned the dinosaurs. Defeat more enemies to unlock powerup items such as Dynamite to decimate your enemies, and keys to free your Dino friends. With adventure and endless modes, you can battle your way through each tier of difficulty or face wave after wave of enemies until you fail.

name: GoWings Safari
description: Fly over the Safari, taking pictures of wildlife and capturing poachers with your net gun!

name: Summer times Afternoon
description: "Summer times Afternoon" is a story to the VR puzzle game, players will be able to create a VR room to spend a number of wonderful days, through time, back to the space 90 years of China, to experience the humanities and customs at the same time Using the controller to pick up items in the room to find clues to understand the love story between men and women, the memories of the summer had a good afternoon

name: Dooors VR
description:
"Dooors VR" is stage clear type real escape content.
Solve the mystery hidden in the room, use the item, open the door and complete all the stages!

name: MazeSnake
description:
Solve mazes, collect powerups, and build up your collection of snakes!     
MazeSnake is a 2D game in which the player (that is, you) is a snake. You try to solve as many mazes as you can, in order to collect XP and level up. However, each maze has some powerups, which will assist you in your maze-solving by allowing you to teleport, break walls, and more! You can also collect coins, which can be used to purchase more snakes or just get some powerups, as well as get XP to level up. As you progress through the game, the mazes will get harder, and eventually become timed. Your goal is to get to as high a level as possible!

name: Blanco: The Color of Adventure
description: Take control of Blanco, a curious cube shaped character, and guide him through many large and unique worlds to seek adventure at its finest!

name: LoveHacks: Book 1
description: #LoveHacks, Book 1 is the first book of the #LoveHacks series. It is followed by #LoveHacks, Book 2.

name: Mysteries of the Heart: The Psychic Detective Case Files
description: This is a mystery/suspense ADV, so you must use your detective skills to solve puzzles and crimes. It employs a 'voices of the heart' system where you can tell what a character is thinking. You'll have to collect clues to solve the crimes, which quickly escalating from simple theft.

name: Super Mario Dream World
description:
Plot: While Mario & Luigi were chasing after Bowser's minions, they find a way into the Subcon. While they're there, they hear that Wart's back.

Features
-Wall Jump
-SMB2 Health Bar
-Custom Music
-OW Coin Counter
-59 exits

name: Taiheiyou no Arashi: Koukoku no Kouhai Koko ni Ari, 1942 Senkan Yamato Hankou no Kouhou
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
description:
This is the official mobile port of Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location!

Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.

Five Nights at Freddy's Sister Location is the fifth installment in the Five Nights at Freddy's series, featuring new characters, new places, and new terrors!

name: Dynamic Chord feat.Liar-S V Edition
description: A Vita port.

name: 3D Columns
description: A 3D Classics port of Columns only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: 3D Alien Syndrome
description: A 3D Classics port of Alien Syndrome only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: 3D Thunder Force III
description: A 3D Classics port of Thunder Force III only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record
description: Re:Birthday Song: Koi wo Utau Shinigami - Another Record is an Adventure game, developed by honeybee+ and published by Asgard, which was released in Japan in 2016.

name: The 9th Annual Vanilla Level Design Contest: Collaboration Hack
description: The 9th Annual Vanilla Level Design Contest Collab Hack of 2016 features 108 contest submissions, along with various staff, judge, and post-game levels. There are a total of 152 exits spread across 117 levels.

name: Dismal Anhedonia Land
description: IT WON'T EVER FEEL AS GOOD

name: The Black Watchmen: Alone in the Dark Web
description: In the Alone in the Dark Web DLC, you'll need to complete an all new in-client mission that brings you to the brink of the dark web - and insanity. Investigate the hidden secrets behind an occult website to discover the ultimate truths.

name: Saki Zenkoku Hen Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 6 Gentou Rondo
description: Sequel of Harukanaru Toki no Naka De 6 that was announced during the Haruka Matsuri 2016 event.

name: Ken ga Kimi: Momoyo Tsuzuri
description: Ken ga Kimi is Japanese legend ADV and is highly recommended since released at Japan. Ken ga Kimi: Momoyo Tsuzuri is the FD of the original game and it has 100 stories included.

name: Amakano+
description: This is the fandisc for Amakano, with two episodes for each of the three heroines: a summer episode and a future episode culminating in marriage. It also includes other mini bonuses, like special commemorative voices and desktop accessories. Each heroine will get 5 H scenes.

name: Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! A Plus Disk
description: The packaged version of A1~A5. Also contains Majikoi A Plus Disk which includes 4 new scenarios.

name: 3D Deer Sniper Hunting Game 2017
description:
Ultimate Shooting takes the most popular and realistic hunting game to extreme wilderness environments in search of the biggest, most prized game around. Go from rookie to master sportsman as your experience level increases, and upgrade to greater weapons, equipment and clothing.

The more successful hunt trips you take, the more you'll be able to enhance your hunter's skills. sights on black bear, axis deer, moose and more. Animals' behaviors have never been more realistic, so exercise extreme caution as these wilderness inhabitants will sometimes charge right at you! Relive your greatest kills, vitals are recorded as well as bullet trajectory and kill locations.

Think you've got what it takes to become a master hunter. The challenge has been issued... become a sniper hunting legend

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded
description:
"Join the colorful cast of Touhou characters on an incredible journey through the Tower of Desire! Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded is the definitive edition of a roguelike masterpiece, filled with new dungeons to explore, new items to collect, and new faces to meet!

Newcomers and veterans of the Touhou series will love journeying through the land of Gensokyo with Reimu Hakurei, the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine, as well as new faces such as the spunky magician Marisa Kirisame, and wind priestess Sanae Kochiya!

And now, with a ton of new content, new and veteran players can experience the world of Touhou in the complete edition of Touhou Genso Wanderer!"

name: Gourmet Dream
description: Gourmet Dream is a management game in which you take up the role of a restaurant manager and help your shop to grow.

name: Radiant Flux: Hyperfractal
description: Data-fractal hyper-structures are the new storage medium favoured by big companies. You are a neo-hacker, a new breed of bedroom fract-breaker, and these data structures are your playground. After receiving an unusual email instructing you to hack your own homepage, you discover a hidden world that will take you through the hack-zone and deep into the dark-web to yield untold riches in lost and forbidden software.

name: Hit Ninja
description: Get your shurikens ready and become a ninja legend!

name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
description: The only "parody runner" style game on Wii U. Join the Zombie Brigade and travel around the world, meet interesting people, and BITE THEIR BRAINS.

name: Geki Yaba Runner Deluxe
description: Run like there's gnome tomorrow!

name: Osomatsu-san: Matsumatsuri!
description: Help one of the sextuplets rise to popularity as you win more minigames. The more you win, the more illustrations, voice clips, and backgrounds you can unlock. You can then use these to create your very own Osomatsu-san scenes!

name: Momotaro Dentetsu 2017: Tachiagare Nippon!!
description:
Japan's seminal train simulation spin-off of the Momotaro Densetsu series finally returns after a five year absence.

Momotaro Dentetsu 2017: Tachiagare Nippon!! is the first Momotaro Dentetsu game for the Nintendo 3DS and is developed by Valhalla Games. It is normally owned by Konami, but it was licensed to Nintendo.

name: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 1-2-3 Triple Pack
description: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 1-2-3 Triple Pack is a compilation for the Nintendo 3DS containing Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives, Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 2 and Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage.

name: Hatsuru Koto Naki Mirai Yori
description: Sin descripción

name: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage
description: Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage is a compilation for the Nintendo 3DS and the last game of the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives series. This compilation includes the remaining five previously-released 3D Classics games, as well as four brand new games and two unlockable SG-1000 games given stereoscopic 3D support.

name: Baldr Heart EXE
description:
-Clear a number of strange stages awaiting you in the abyss of ES!
In BALDR HEART you can enjoy battles in situations that are not possible in the main story.
It is a content that you can fully enjoy BALDR HEART's ACT, whether you have completed the ACT part of the main story or the survival mode or not.

-Supports online replay!
You can upload your own replay and view the replay of users all over the country on a stage-by-stage basis.

-Let's strengthen the armament freely!
You can freely enhance the parameters of the weapon girl by using the points obtained by clearing the stage.
Since the armament level is the strongest from the beginning, let's give out your own personality by allocating points!

-New weapon girl participation
Battle with new friends is more fun!
Introducing a unique new weapon girl!
Bring them to accompany new tactics and new combos!
An episode of four armed girls occurs in the depths of Es.
As you deepen the bond with each heroine, you will develop H-scenes with them...
Each character has one armament. Weapons can be enjoyed in the strongest state of Lv.3 from the beginning.

-Linkage with BALDR HEART
With new weapons, let's go to the main story!
The weapon girls added in "BALDR HEART EXE" can also be used in the main part of "BALDR HEART"!
Furthermore, by linking, even those who do not have the special weapons of the main story will be able to use all the weapon girls other than "Tsubasa of the rotating leg"!

name: Advanced Gaming Platform: Epica
description: Marked for death by the Imperial Corporation you have been marooned on a desolate planet in the Attria Prime system. Fight to survive the inhospitable frontier in this post-earth dystopia. AGP::Epica is tactical RPG intended for advanced players seeking a challenge.

name: Cosmos Crash VR
description: The first person shooting & puzzle VR game.

name: Heroine Anthem Zero
description:
Heroine Anthem Zero is the first installment in an epic fantasy adventure game from WindThunder Studio.
Action-hungry gamers beware! The core of this game is the storytelling, complemented by a haunting soundtrack and stunning visual art style.

name: Button Tales
description: Button Tales is a breathtaking and challenging Match 3 game with innovation mechanics. This is a real fresh perspective on the Match 3 genre. Meet cute characters and explore the breathtaking environment. The wonderful music and effects will help you delve right into the game.

name: Gnomes Garden 3: The Thief of Castles
description: Gnomes Garden 3 — a new chapter in this exciting fantasy/strategy game. Head off into unknown lands and defeat the warlock!

name: Weird creatures
description: Blow-up your mind with the easy fantasy shooting simulator. You will travel across forests, deserts and snowy mountains, accompanied by a powerful ally vehicle to care of. Various weird inhabitants resist you to collect art pieces. Ever struggle to be rewarded.

name: Mankind Defender
description:
Can you defend humanity from destruction? 
Are you ready for an unusual adventure? 
Get ready because we start soon...

name: Danger Room
description: Survive the holographic barrage of turrets in the Danger Room on the HTC Vive. Slow time, dodge lasers, suck bullets and fire them back at enemies!

name: Revival Reset
description: This is a tale, dedicated to those who have been a victim of bullying

name: Pinheads Bowling VR
description: Pinheads Bowling VR is a fun new way to play the classic game of bowling, with animated pins and sideline attractions that create an altogether unique bowling experience!

name: The Price of Freedom
description: You are Agent Zero. Your mission: assassinate Benjamin Miller, a radical who broke into CIA facilities and stole top secret chemical weapons research. Your mission quickly takes a dark turn as you learn the truth of what Miller was searching for that night. Become part of the story in this interactive Room-Scale VR narrative, told in Chinese and English. Inspired by true events.

name: Fireworks Desert Blast
description:
You're alone in the desert with an endless supply of fireworks.  
 
Let the rockets (and your imagination) fly.

name: Shadows
description: Shadows is a puzzle-based platformer taking place in a mysterious, silhouetted world. Your goal is to construct a beacon of light to call for help and find your way home. Throughout your journey, you will need to balance the powers of light and darkness to keep yourself alive.

name: Marinatide
description: Marinatide is a sea fishing and exploration game, combining elements of strategy and adventure. Roam the sea, catch fish and complete the quest to fishing glory!

name: VR Monster Awakens
description:
Be a giant MONSTER! Moving around the city in REAL ACTION and DESTROY everything to release your anger!
Approach specific destination and knock down the city buildings & vehicles under the pressure of enemies attack in first-monster perspective.

name: Zombie Vikings: Stab-a-thon
description: Battle your friends in this free to play game based in the Zombie Vikings universe! With weapons like 'Blunt Fish Trauma' and 'The Pulverizer for Patient People' you'll hack and slash for your life in this brawler game for up to 4 players.

name: Game Royale 2 - The Secret of Jannis Island
description: Game Royale 2 - The Secret of Jannis Island is the highly anticipated sequel to our successful first adventure game Game Royale - Riders of the lost bald. The game is a point-&-click adventure and a tribute to the great classics of this genre. In German language only!

name: AffordaGolf Online
description:
AffordaGolf is a Multiplayer Online Mini-golf game!In AffordaGolf you can play mini-golf with your friends and up to 127 people on unlimited amount of maps (courses).Key FeaturesOnline Multiplayer up to 127 players in same map.
Ball Customization, any texture and color of your desire can be added to your ball.
Trail Customization, any texture and color of your desire can be added to your trail.
Map Editor, create, edit and publish your own maps and let everyone play in them.
9 Default Maps
User created maps
Steam Cards
Steam Achievements
Steam Stats and Cloud
Steam Workshop
No EARLY ACCESS

name: Old Friend
description: Lose yourself in a vibrant and interactive psychedelic dance party brimming with joyful insanity.

name: Crazy Max VR
description: Crazy Max VR is a Virtual reality room scale shooting game made exclusively for the HTC Vive. Survive on different playgrounds the stream of “crazy” creatures and the boss monster(s).

name: Warka Flarka Flim Flam
description: Warka Flarka Flim Flam has you juggling with flat circles. You start with two paddles with which you bat one circle from one hand to the other, and then further balls, effects and influences are added to make juggling more difficult. Every mistake you make will be punished, starting you over again and again on your Journey to become the #1 Warka of Flarkas!

name: Art of War: Red Tides
description: Art of War: Red Tides is a multi-player strategy game currently in BETA with the core aspects of the game implemented. The rules of a battle in Red Tides are simple and easy to grasp, but you will have different experience in each game. Lead your troops of hundreds units to victory!

name: Sugar Fever
description: Sugar Fever, is a casual game, where you have to combine candies quickly to complete all the missions. Special combos allow you to win more time so you can go further.

name: Vertigo
description:
Vertigo is a first person story-based shooter for the HTC Vive.

Explore the sprawling underground facilities of Planck Interdimensional's Quantum Reactor, filled with dark secrets, adorable drones, and parallel universes. You find yourself in the bowels of this machine after being whisked away from your home, and, armed with only the tools you can find, you must make your way to the surface, and the truth.

This machine lies mysteriously abandoned, but there may be something lurking in the darkness. Why else would those adorable security drones shoot on sight, and the turrets do their best to blast you into a small crater?

Face the challenge of escaping the depths of the quantum reactor.

name: RollocoBall
description:
The game for those who adore rolling on roller coasters.
Inspired by roller coasters of New York, Las Vegas, Los Angeles.

This is a simple arcade game. Try to avoid spikes on your way and see how far you can go!

name: Watch Dogs 2: T-Bone Content Bundle
description:
Get the style and the swagger of legendary hacker T-Bone Grady in the first Watch_Dogs 2 DLC bundle! Outfit Marcus with T-Bone's signature look, and plow a path of epic destruction through San Francisco in T-Bone's customized truck - specially equipped to lift and annihilate vehicles, enemies, and anything else in your way.

Bundle Includes;
- T-Bone Truck available in the car-on-demand app
- One complete T-Bone inspired outfit
- New elite enemy class, armed with laser-guided grenade launchers
- New co-op difficulty mode

name: Falling Lights: The Crypt – Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Realm of the Mad God: Free Welcome Pack
description: In the mood to kick-start your Realm adventure? You have come to the right place! This pack contains items worth 20$ and has everything you need to start your journey for awesome loot! Hatch your eggs for a cool companion by your side. Afterwards chug the potions for better loot and use your keys to open the dungeons of your choice to get that loot! And of course, you should do it in style - you will find some extra character customization items in here as well!

name: Genius Quiz Soccer
description: Genius Quiz Soccer is a soccer-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Minecraft: Vault-Tec Mash-up
description: Welcome to the wasteland! Crack open the Vault containing 44 unique skins, custom textures, re-skinned mobs, a special post-apocalyptic map, an original soundtrack compilation, and a Pip-Boy-inspired UI.

name: Hidden Object: Missing Violin - Amazing Adventures
description:
Traverse through hidden object levels, find items that might lead you towards the locations of the instruments and Antonio Stradivari. Solve the Hidden Object mystery and complete the collection.
Help Giuseppe Stradivari find the missing violins! The violins were made by Nicola Amati, her ancestor's teacher and Giuseppe Guarneri. You must also find the unique violin stand made out of Tyrolean wood to complete the collection.

name: Drakomon Legends: Monster Dragon Battle RPG Games
description: Drakomon is a fun 3D RPG where you collect monsters and fight battles in an epic journey to become the best trainer in the world of Dragonia. Capture multiple monsters with unique stats and skills. Featuring a beautiful, immersive 3D world with an engrossing storyline and fully animated 3D battles. Play online duels versus trainers from all over the world.

name: Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator: Northeastern USA
description: This DLC for Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator features the area of New York with detailed city buildings and over 10 airports, like KJFK John F. Kennedy International and KGLA La Guardia. Additionally this DLC features high resolution aerial images of New York and the surrounding area with up to 1 meter resolution.

name: Inside & Limbo Bundle
description: Get Playdead's two critically acclaimed titles Inside & Limbo

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Vikings Scenario Pack
description: Bring Europe under your rule as the mightiest Viking lord in the most detailed scenario released yet for Sid Meier’s Civilization VI. The Viking Scenario Pack also includes three new Natural Wonders and six new City-States, two of which grant new tile improvements.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Poland Civilization & Scenario Pack
description: Jadwiga rules Poland in Sid Meier's Civilization VI! Religious and expansionist, Poland can gain control of other civ's tiles when they fortify their borders, and Jadwiga makes Relics more valuable and Holy Sites more effective.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities: Detroit
description: Detroit is home to the busiest airport in the state of Michigan. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (KDTW) is the second largest Delta Airlines hub in terms of daily flights. Detroit Metro and the many other smaller airports make this a complex and busy environment for pilots.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim East Africa
description: Toposim East Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Eastern African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Chicago
description: Welcome to Chicago! US Cities X: Chicago for FSX: Steam Edition brings you the famed Windy City in high detail – it even includes a glimpse of the future as you are able to see the Chicago Spire, a skyscraper currently in development!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Central Africa
description: Toposim Central Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Central African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Poke646: Anniversary Edition
description: The release of the "Poke646: Anniversary Edition" on Dec 21st 2016 marks the 15th anniversary of the original "Poke646" release and the 10th anniversary of the "Poke646: Vendetta" sequel release.

name: Gladius VR
description: Gladius is an immersive VR sword fighting game set in ancient Rome. As a gladiator, you will choose your weapons, train against different enemies, and finally fight for your freedom in an epic battle against the mightiest warriors and mythical creatures of the time. Win the crowd and you will win your freedom.

name: Grumpy Cat's Worst Game Ever
description: Grumpy Cat’s 1st official mobile game is here! It's the worst-game-you-will-ever-play.

name: Ayakashigami
description: Shinboku is an androgyne♂♀, having the reproductive organs of both sexes. Entrusted with the task of surveying a group of mysterious youkai, he ends up sharing a very eventful summer alongside the girls. This is a friendship-filled adventure with a dash of horror and a little something else.

name: My Town: Beauty Contest
description:
Calling all aspiring stylists and fashionistas! If you and your child love fashion, design and hair My Town : Beauty Contest is the perfect app for you. There are six different locations to explore as you get your favorite character ready to compete. 
In the main show room, you design the show! No beauty contest is complete without a stage and you can choose from over 400 items to design the perfect backdrop. Once the stage is set, it’s time to visit the flower shop to customize over 60 different floral décor options. You then can even choose the music to be played during the show! 
 
Once the stage is set, have your contestant begin their spa day in the My Town hair salon so they can get their hair done by the leading hair stylist in the industry. So many hair styles to choose from! After hair comes makeup! Our My Town makeup artists are ready to treat you to facial treatments so your makeup will look flawless. 
 
It’s almost show time, but first you have to visit the clothing store, so your contestant can pick out their contest winning outfit from over 50 choices. 
Can’t get onto the cover of the My Town magazine without having a photoshoot! Select from a myriad of backgrounds, then choose your magazine cover and print out a poster for your contestant. Don’t forget to hang the posters all over to promote your winner!

name: Bor
description: Play with Bor the Viking through 4 worlds! Unlock all the secret levels and save his 60 (60!!!!) wives in this colorful old-school platform.

name: Sound Voltex IV: Heavenly Haven
description: The fourth installment in the Sound Voltex franchise.

name: Geometry Dash World
description: Flex your clicky finger as you jump, fly and flip your way through dark caves and spiky obstacles. Discover the lands, play online levels and find the secrets hidden within the World of Geometry Dash!

name: War Commander: Rogue Assault
description: War Commander: Rogue Assault is an MMORTS for mobile devices.

name: Angry Birds Blast!
description: Angry Birds Blast is a free-to-play tile-matching puzzle game, developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by Rovio Entertainment in 2016 as a spin-off from the Angry Birds franchise.

name: Boom Ball 2 for Kinect
description: Sequel to Boom Ball for Kinect, featuring 2 player co-op

name: Silly Sausage: Doggy Dessert
description: Game for android and ios.

name: Hot Wheels: Race Off
description: Hot Wheels: Race Off was a free mobile racing game published by Hutch Games Ltd. The game was one of their best known products, with over 50 million downloads.

name: Asphalt Street Storm Racing
description: Game for android, ios and Windows.

name: Street Fighter V: 2017 Deluxe Edition
description:
This version includes:

- Street Fighter V
- Street Fighter V Season 1 Character Pass
- Street Fighter V Season 2 Character Pass

name: Guardians of Orion
description: Guardians of Orion is a Sci-Fi Shooter featuring Cooperative, Competitive, Social, Exploration and Dog-fighting Gameplay!

name: Jewel bits
description: Follow the story of Kisa and Marcin, students of Professor Nichola, that suddenly are caught up in a intense adventure.

name: A Tale of Caos: Overture
description: An epic journey begins! Terry, a brilliant, messy girl, is beginning her greatest adventure, following her master, Albion McMaster, whose goals are quite dark and mysterious. With Heimlich, her mechanical owl and best friend, Terry will travel through amazing worlds and many unpredictable dangers!

name: Nemesis Perspective
description: Challenge your friend in a classic hero versus giant boss monster setting. Wielding VR equipment your objective is to prove your superiority by crushing those who disturb your sacred peace (namely your friend who’s playing as your opponent with console controller).

name: Castle of No Escape 2
description: Explore 216 rooms of randomly generated hazards and enemies while collecting necessary artifacts in Castle of No Escape 2, a fantasy themed strategy RPG. Hundreds of monsters are roaming inside, guarding the sword shards - the last known thing to be capable of defeating the demonic castle owner.

name: Happy Maze
description: Easy game for easy life. Enjoy.

name: Sullen
description: Sullen is a fast-paced, challenging platformer set inside of a circle. Your ultimate goal is to work through all of the levels and defeat the sullen eye that relentlessly attacks you. You assume control of a small pentagon and must dodge, jump, and shoot your way to victory.

name: Amazeing adventures
description: Amazeing adventures is addictive game for VR where your goal is to guide your ball through many varied mazes specially designed for each level. Using your motion controllers you have to hold the maze in your hands and tilt the maze to keep your ball moving but also at the same time to avoid many threats inside. Your Virtual Reality headset will allow you to peek behind corners and look around.

name: Teratini VR
description: In this VR adventure, you are the Dragon Mage who glides through the air, smashes attacks back at opponents, and beckons a dragon when the going gets rough. Invent new moves and perfect them in the Sanctuary before taking back Teratini.

name: Robot City Stadium
description: Robot City Stadium is a competitive multiplayer disc-combat sport focused on skill, nuance, and mastery.

name: Ancient Guardian
description: Ancient Guardian - this is adventure first-person shooter in a procedurally-generated locations. You play as a father who has to find his lost daughter, avoiding a meeting with dangerous enemies, avoiding traps and solving puzzles.

name: Able Black
description: Able Black is an immersive story experience that uses images and sound to guide you through a series of puzzles.

name: Kamio Recoil
description: Kamio Recoil is an exploration shooter, where every shot propels you through zero-gravity! Play as an assembled squad of five girls equipped with Spirit Arms as they maneuver through intricate areas and blast away the yokai invasion in order to defend the world.

name: Stern Pinball Arcade
description: Real pinball machines created by the world's most experienced producer of arcade-quality pinball machines can now be played on your PC. Over 10 tables including modern classics like Star Trek, AC/DC, and Mustang are available as DLC with two FREE tables to play every month!

name: Blueshift
description: fly and jet around vast landscapes at ridiculous speeds. Spread your wings and use your rocket boosters to glide, do tricks, go off jumps, ski, or anything you can imagine.

name: TacoFace
description: Have you ever dreamed of having rocket launchers for arms and laser blasters for eyes while delicious tacos rain down on you? Well, your dream is now a reality. Uh, virtual reality.

name: Xmas Zombie Rampage
description:
Nonstop fast paced zombie shooter action. Can you survive against the hordes of zombies and save Xmas?
Only the best can survive! Be the one!

name: Domino Craft VR
description:
domino Craft VR:Wanna trigger and enjoy some awesome domino chain reactions? Or even better, build up your own freely and quickly?

Domino Craft is a casual & user-generation-content VR game. Everyone can start it easily and play very long time comfortably. You can create domino fantasies just like in reality but without the limits of time, space and elements.

There will be two game modes:
Challenge: You will be immersed in a fancy & toy world and go through a series of levels with puzzles from easy to hard. Gradually you improve your skill and become a domino master.
Creation: You can design and create your own domino toppling chains by lots of pieces and toys in this sand box. Build whatever you want to show how cool you are!

Our team’s dream is to bring you games which are unique, juicy and can be played for very long-time. Enjoy yourself in the Domino Fantasy.

name: Holiday Simulator : Wacky Sleigh Ride
description: Holiday Simulator – Wacky Sleigh Ride tests your skills to see if you have what it takes to deliver all the presents before the sun comes up.  Choose between tossing presents or lumps of coal in this comedic journey in the north pole.

name: Remain
description: Artem has to spend in abandoned house the whole night, but it really abandoned the house? And what secrets are hidden in its walls creepy? Answers to these questions can be found in our Remain game.

name: Psycho on the loose
description:
An assassin with a rise in his career to kill his target is out on a murdering spree. He is out there with alot of motives but his main motive is two eliminate all targets and who ever may get in his way. He is stealthy with his moves and he always watches his back, he changes outfits to suit his missions and has a van with a variety of weapons to choose from, they range from your smaller weapons to the larger weapons, even throwables such as, grenades and molotoves. If he is not careful and is to roucous then he has more then just his target to deal with when backup arrives. His missions take him from woodlands to suburb and cities, no matter if its day or night.  
 
You are him so make sure you are stealthy, move corpse to not alert those around. Earn money from each person killed, pass the level and you get to keep your earnings, die and loose all money earned. With a variety of maps and missions, it shall take you into places day or night. Be prepared and select weapons to help you. Good luck Cane!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules VI: Race for Olympus
description: This time, Hercules and Megara are involved in the detective story. Alarm at Olympus is showing the absence of Zeus, who rarely left the peak. A few clues reveal the fact that Zeus has been abducted. Hercules and Megara begin the investigation.

name: Cranks and Goggles
description: Cranks & Goggles is a top down racing game set in the roaring 20s. Players find themselves as one of the worlds first auto-racing superstars and placed behind the wheel of a number of historical race cars. The game’s engine utilizes real physics in order to mimic the unstable (and quite dangerous) nature of the period’s automobiles. Gentleman racers will travel across all of Europe in order to compete in the most gripping of circuits, with prizes that will make them the envy of their fellow racers.

name: PPAP: The Game
description: PPAP: The Game is a rhythm action mobile game released on Line based on Pikotaro's PPAP music video.

name: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony Demo Ver.
description: The demo version of Danganronpa V3. Having a completely original story from the full game, it features characters from previous Danganronpa games having to solve a murder case together.

name: Nope quiz
description: Nope Quiz is a puzzle game. This crazy quiz features an extravagant host who tries to stick you with particularly sneaky and funny questions. It's up to you to surpass yourself and win the challenge.

name: Templum Dormiens Dei
description: A single level for Heretic, which requires ZDoom 2.8.1 or later. This map is meant to follow the events of Dark Deity's Bastion, and serve as an ending to the storyline which began with that level.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Parade Pack
description:
Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins. This bundle includes:

- Police Parade Set
- FNYC Parade Set
- Gemstone Amethyst Weapon Skin
- Glitch Barrium Weapon Skin
- Safari Monteverde Weapon Skin

name: Genius Quiz Christmas
description: Genius Quiz Christmas is a Christmas-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Love Brings You Home
description: Love Brings You Home is an Otome game by Voltage Inc. that's currently available in Japanese and English.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Green Day: Song Pack II
description: Play "Good Riddance (Time Of Your Life)", "21 Guns", “Wake Me Up When September Ends”, “Longview” and "Bang Bang" by Green Day on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: Achikaps
description: Simple economic strategy without donations

name: Fallen London: The Empress' Shadow
description:
An addon for Fallen London. The Premium Story for the seasonal event of Sackmas in December, 2016.

Can be started from the Seasonal storylet during Sackmas, or from the Fate page.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Super Pack 1
description:
Extand your experience with new exciting content! 2 new playable characters: Cabbe (with his Super Saiyan transformation) and Frost (Final Form)
1 new master: Hit
5 new attacks
3 new Parallel Quests
2 new costumes
5 Super Souls
2 emotes

name: Ticket to Ride: Germany
description: Discover Germany at the turn of the century with this new map! Dash through the German landscape with an entirely new vertical map! With routes requiring as many as 7 train cars to conquer, key European countries to link together and pivotal cities for your network, you will need to plan ahead if you want to grow your railroad empire. The competition is fierce, and your opponents might outmaneuver you if you can’t adapt to the board!

name: The Binding of Isaac: Antibirth
description: Antibirth is a free fan-made expansion for The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth. The mod includes new items, characters, enemies, challenges, secrets, and much more! The mod was primarily developed by Kilburn, NotYourSagittarius, and LeatherIceCream, with music by Mudeth.

name: VR the Anime Girls Method
description:
Pretty girls support your exercise!
You can lose weight in an extremely beautiful VR space.
This is the best exercise game that you've never seen before!
（※There are individual difference how you can lose weight）

name: Rescue the Enchanter
description:
Continue the adventure of The Enchanted Books in this much longer point-and-click style puzzle adventure game. Search for the enchanter who has been trapped for years within the enchanted world of the last book you discovered! Find clues, solve puzzles, and uncover tools along the way needed to unlock and explore vast, exotic worlds and rescue the enchanter.

Uncle Henry has started to search for the enchanter within the book, but was unsuccessful so he is leaving this important task to you. He left clues in the enchanted world within the book to help you on your journey.

Your Uncle Henry has been renowned for discovering lost treasures for as long as you can remember. His legendary stories of adventure excited your imagination as you were a child growing up. Now with your newly acquired archeology skills, he has been reaching out from time to time for your help in tracking down some of these difficult to find treasures.

This captivating adventure game has:
- Custom designed beautiful HD graphics!
- Custom composed soundtrack and sound effects!
- A built-in hint system for when you are stumped
- A dynamic map to show the screens you have visited and current location
- A camera that takes photos of clues and symbols as you discover them
- Dozens of puzzles, clues, and items
- Auto saves your progress
- Available for phones and tablets!

name: Arrow.io
description: Join the battle! Playing as Pixel Man, Defeat players from all round the world.

name: Easy Joe World
description: Help Easy Joe to find the exit of each level by interacting with the different objects on the screen!

name: Sakura Christmas Party
description: Free Winged Cloud game. During the holiday season, Fumio catches up with three of his closest friends at their yearly Christmas party.

name: VR-Xterminator
description: VR-Xterminator is a VR Indie Arcade Shooter, which transports the nostalgic Arcade Hall Experience into a modern 360° VR environment with innovative VR Motion Control.

name: Drone Hunter VR
description: Are you prepared to defend the world against an alien invasion? Test your skills and reflexes in this highly immersive and intense game - Drone Hunter VR. You will be put through a series of tests to prove you are worthy to defend our planet using the top secret DH125, a hybrid alien/US weapon. Will you be the chosen one?

name: SwingStar VR
description: Swing around a virtual reality world using a giant sticky hand attached to your head. SwingStar VR is a third-person swinging physics puzzler that puts players through a wild ride, accelerating the player as they swing. It's wacky and super fun.

name: Duckles: the Jigsaw Witch
description: Lured by a vengeful spirit of a defeated witch, Duckles, and his friends, find themselves trapped on a mysterious island full of deadly sorceresses! What heinous plans does this gruesome Witch have for him? And what is the true origin of the island?

name: Gooblins
description: Save yourself from waves of Gooblins! Though appearing cute and cuddly, these creatures are determined to scatter your remains into space with plasma, fireballs, or kamikaze attacks. Survive the onslaught while killing Gooblins in color combos to rack up points and climb the leaderboard!

name: Magical x Spiral
description:
Medianne Phirtia, a student residing in the region of Midgard.
She has long held an admiration for 'Celestria' — a place spoken of in fairy tales where users of magic reside.

name: Chunky Orbits
description:
Get up-close and personal with Gravity.

Chunky Orbits is a simulation of free-floating objects in space based on real life physics. Each object in the scene attracts each of the others in a cosmic tug-of-war that we call Gravity. Toss out a few boulders and contemplate the wonders of the Universe.

name: 3D Arcade Fishing
description: Are you going to make that really big haul? With the right equipment and technique as well as a clever choice of bait you won't have any problems catching a lot of fish.

name: Retro Parking
description: This parking simulation is a good opportunity to show your ability to drive in tight spaces.

name: Children of Orc
description:
Lead your civilization of Orc Children, stranded on a planet. 
Build infrastructure, explore continents, and instruct your peers. 
 
Children of Orc mixes the point-and-click adventure game with real-time-strategy. 
You control one single Orc and will have to instruct your tribe on how to explore and exploit your habitat.

name: Wanderland
description: Wanderland, the mystery adventure from Artogon, the world-famous creator of great casual adventures series such as Shiver, Treasure Seekers and Depths of Betrayal. Sleeping Beauty has been kidnapped! Explore a world full of temples, crypts, and more.

name: Fighting Space
description: Featuring carefully curated 256 color palette sprites, a smashing retro soundtrack and intense action, Fighting Space brings back the glorious days of yesteryear DOS gaming – back when red meat, 33.6k modems and colossal 19 inch CRT displays where cream of the crop!

name: Heavy Impact
description: Heavy Impact thrusts you into the ring as a first-person robot brawler made for Virtual Reality. Deliver devastating blows, and dodge big hits! Slow down time to deliver crucial combos, or avoid trouble in the last second. Become the king of the bob-and-weave, test your metal and scrap the competition!

name: Gulman 4: Still alive
description: Gulman 4: Still alive – is a single-player first-person shooter by Svyatoslav Gulyaev.

name: Desolate Wastes: Vendor Chronicles
description:
Vendor Chronicles puts you in the shoes of a Vendor in post-apocalyptia!  
Manage your trade, set your defences, deal with locals and fight hordes of mutants in this new perspective on post-apocalyptic survival!

name: Smoots Tennis Survival Zombie
description: Save your Smoot from the hordes of Zombie Smoots!

name: The Crypts of Anak Shaba
description: The Crypts of Anak Shaba is a VR based swords and sorcery style adventure. Full arm representations for VR are in, some limiters need to be added on rotations. Motion is currently touch pad controlled but teleportation is also being added if touch pad is uncomfortable.While defeating dozens of foes you must discover the four relics to force Masharan back into this dimension for a final confrontation. Single and dual wield weapons with hip and back sheaths.

name: President Erect VR
description: Frustrated by the current political climate? Slap and Punch the President Erect or Smack him with a celebrity Dildo.

name: Nightmare
description:
An indie horror about dreams and nightmares the protagonist has.  
You play as a man whose family was killed. You're not allowed to go beyond your own home or else there's consequences. Nightmares and insomnia torment you every day. Will you be able to cope with them and understand what they mean? 
The game is based on real people's dreams and experiences.

name: Magic Hour
description:
With Magic Hour, get started with VR photography! 
 
Take beautiful pictures by exploring an island lit in the perfect light and experiment with an accurate virtual SLR camera that incorporates all the physics of a real camera, in VR.

name: Entschuldigung
description: Entschuldigung (which means ‘sorry’ in German) is a bleak horror story, told by a lost young man who longs to find a place in which he can feel safe. Set in pre-war Berlin, the story is driven by an insatiable curiosity that leads our protagonist down a very dark path into the unknown. As he fights to make sense of his reality, he is also fighting to make sense of himself.

name: Child Phobia: Nightcoming Fears
description: Child Phobia: Nightcoming Fears is a 2D psychological thriller horror game. The story is about a little boy that has problem in family - and this problem converts in fear during the night. You will be able to explore various locations during the nightmares, and watch the family drama during the day.

name: Santa Sling
description: Santa Sling is a first-person VR where you play as Santa delivering presents to kids from your sleigh in a Christmas-themed town.                           Enter the VR world of Christmas!

name: Distant Space
description: Distant Space are present the arcade game of cosmic fights in arcade style of the 80's, this is a game where you can control the spaceship and forced to destroy extraterrestrials, which are moving in the certain order.

name: Rollercoaster Dreams
description: Visit the amusement parks which are created by the players from all over the world. The players from all over the world will visit the amusement parks which are created by you.

name: Air Race Speed
description: Take speed to a whole new level with this racing hit! Air Race Speed is a solo time-trial racing game where you pilot the most powerful futuristic jets through adrenaline-fuelled challenging tracks. Compete against your friends through online rankings, and get to the top of the rankings.

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic
description:
RollerCoaster Tycoon Classic is a new RCT experience, combining the best features from two of the most successful and beloved RCT games in the series’ history – RollerCoaster Tycoon and RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.

Create and run amazing parks complete with the most outrageous rides imaginable. RCT Classic includes a mixture of authentic playability, depth of gameplay and unique graphical style of Chris Sawyer’s original best-selling RollerCoaster Tycoon PC Games, now enhanced for handheld devices.

Packed with content, players can enjoy designing and building roller coasters and rides, landscaping parks and managing the staff and finances to keep their guests happy and the money flowing in. Can you become the next RollerCoaster Tycoon?

name: Halo Wars: Definitive Edition
description: Halo Wars: Definitive Edition is an enhanced version of the real-time strategy classic, Halo Wars, updated to run natively on Xbox One and Windows 10. Set early in the iconic war between the Covenant and UNSC - made famous by the Halo FPS games - Halo Wars: Definitive Edition provides a unique angle on the war while bringing new heroes to the battlefield. Control large Halo armies and direct them in action-packed warfare. Halo Wars: Definitive Edition includes improved graphics, new achievements and all the DLC from the landmark game. Re-live the epic campaign or compete in online multiplayer battles with armies of powerful Halo forces at your command.
